nodes.text: Backstab 27 was a French roleplaying magazine from February of 2001. It contained many roleplaying articles, including an adventure which worked for both the West End Games D6 and Wizards of the Coast d20 roleplaying systems. This article, Le Projet T-65 (Translated, Project T-65) was written by Olivier Collin and Vicking Fred with illustrations by Aleksi Briclot.
